mapper.insert: insert into users(USERS_ID,U_CREATED_AT,U_EMAIL,U_PASSWORD,U_NAME,U_PHONE_NUMBER,U_ADDRESS,U_ID,U_JUMIN,U_NICKNAME) values ((select max(users_id) from users)+1, sysdate,#{u_email},#{u_password}, #{u_name},#{u_phone_number}, #{u_address},#{u_id}, #{u_jumin},#{u_nickname})
mapper.select: select users_id,u_id,u_password, u_name,u_jumin,u_email, u_phone_number,u_address, u_nickname,u_point, u_created_at,u_updated_at, u_signout from users where u_id=#{u_id}
